title: Tourism infrastructure must conform to environment friendly, low height, aesthetic architecture, natural cross ventilation; no use of asbestos, no air pollution, minimum outdoor lighting and merging with the surrounding landscape
clause_text: Tourism infrastructure must conform to environment friendly, low height, aesthetic architecture, natural cross ventilation; no use of asbestos, no air pollution, minimum outdoor lighting and merging with the surrounding landscape. The owner shall establish the system for captive energy generation using non-conventional energy sources like solar, wind bio-gas etc. so as to make the development self-sufficient.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
